title: List of Northampton Town F.C. seasons
text:
This is a list of seasons played by <a href="Northampton%20Town%20F.C.">Northampton Town Football Club</a> in English <a href="association%20football">football</a>. It covers the period from the club's inaugural season in 1899, to the end of the last completed season. It details the club's achievements in all major competitions, together with the top scorers and the average attendances for each season. Details of the abandoned <a href="1939%E2%80%9340%20in%20English%20football">1939–40 season</a> and unofficial <a href="World%20War%20II">Second World War</a> leagues are not included.
Northampton Town were founded in 1897, joining the Northants league for 2 seasons before taking their place in the <a href="Midland%20Football%20League%20%281889%29">Midland League</a>, and joined <a href="The%20Football%20League">The Football League</a> for the <a href="1920%E2%80%9321%20in%20English%20football">1920–21 season</a>.
